alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Chester; Decatur; Hardin; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 3:27PM CDT until July 18 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Henderson County in west Tennessee... Southern Benton County in west Tennessee... Southern Carroll County in west Tennessee... Northern Hardin County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Chester County in west Tennessee... Decatur County in west Tennessee... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Linden to near Mifflin, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Camden, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, New Johnsonville, Decaturville, Sardis, Reagan, Blue Goose, Bargerton, Wildersville, Parkers Crossroads, Darden, Montgomery, Scotts Hill, Clarksburg, Saltillo, Milledgeville and Enville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Chester; Decatur; Hardin; Henderson
